titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to both Houses of Parliament, dated at New-Castle, the 10th of June, 1646 together with His Majesties warrant to the governours of Oxford, and all other his garrisons within this kingdome, to quit the same upon honourable tearmes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
